trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of validation to perform.
trans-unit.target: Anger typ av verifiering ska utföras.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> class can enforce validation using a schema or document type definition (DTD).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>klassen kan tillämpa validering med hjälp av en schemat eller dokumentet typdefinition (DTD).</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The ValidationType enumeration specifies the type of validation the created <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instance should perform.
trans-unit.target: Uppräkningen ValidationType anger vilken typ av verifiering den skapade <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>instans ska utföra.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instance can be either a validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object created by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method, or an <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>instansen kan vara antingen en verifierar <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objekt som skapas av den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>metoden, eller en <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>objektet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The validation model has three characteristics, strict, informative, and status.
trans-unit.target: Verifieringen modellen har tre egenskaper, strikt, informativ, och status.

trans-unit.source: Strict, does not allow the mixing of validation types, informative provides a warning if the schema or document type definition (DTD) cannot be found, and status provides warnings if validation cannot be performed for elements and attributes from schemas.
trans-unit.target: Strikt tillåter inte att blanda av, informativa visas en varning om typdefinitionen schema eller dokument (DTD) går inte att hitta och status ger varningar om verifiering inte kan utföras för element och attribut från scheman.

trans-unit.source: Validates if DTD or schema information is found.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerar om DTD-eller schema hittas.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Validates according to the DTD.
trans-unit.target: Verifierar enligt DTD: N.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: No validation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Det utförs ingen verifiering.

trans-unit.source: This setting creates an XML 1.0 compliant non-validating parser.
trans-unit.target: Den här inställningen skapar en XML 1.0 kompatibla icke-verifierande parser.

trans-unit.source: Default attributes are reported and general entities can be resolved by calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Standardattribut rapporteras och allmänna enheter kan lösas genom att anropa <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DOCTYPE is not used for validation purposes.
trans-unit.target: DOCTYPE används inte för verifiering.

trans-unit.source: No validation errors are thrown.
trans-unit.target: Inga valideringsfel utlöses.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Validate according to XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas, including inline XML Schemas.
trans-unit.target: Verifiera enligt XML-Schema definition language (XSD) scheman, inklusive infogade XML-scheman.

trans-unit.source: XML Schemas are associated with namespace URIs either by using the <xref uid="langword_csharp_schemaLocation" name="schemaLocation" href=""></xref> attribute or the provided <xref uid="langword_csharp_Schemas" name="Schemas" href=""></xref> property.
trans-unit.target: XML-scheman som är associerade med namnområde URI: er antingen med hjälp av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_schemaLocation" name="schemaLocation" href=""> </xref> -attributet eller det angivna <xref uid="langword_csharp_Schemas" name="Schemas" href=""> </xref> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Validate according to XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schemas, including inline XDR schemas.
trans-unit.target: Validera enligt scheman för XML-Data Reduced (XDR), inklusive infogade XDR-scheman.

trans-unit.source: XDR schemas are recognized using the <xref uid="langword_csharp_x-schema" name="x-schema" href=""></xref> namespace prefix or the <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas*> property.
trans-unit.target: XDR-scheman identifieras med hjälp av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_x-schema" name="x-schema" href=""> </xref> namnområdesprefix eller <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas*>egenskap.</xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader.Schemas*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
